{{cpp/utility/any/title|reset}}
{{cpp/utility/any/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++17|
void reset() noexcept;
}}

If {{c|*this}} contains a value, destroys the contained value.

{{c|*this}} does not contain a value after this call.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
(none)

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;any&gt;
#include &lt;cassert&gt;

int main()
{
    std::any a{42};
    assert(a.has_value());
    a.reset();
    assert(not a.has_value());
}
}}
